title: flight_plan
description: Flight plan including desired trajectory, preferences and contingency plans.

serial_number.description: Sistem ID of the drone or drones (when is a swarm)

date.description: No special format found. We could require f.i. dd-mm-yy

time.description: Take-off time. No special format found, but we will require the 0-23 format.

origin.description: Origin coords (WGS84 in Decimal Degrees format)

trajectory.description: The minimum WPs are origin an destination. This is optional.

altitude.description: Preferred altitude. Required sea level referred.

geofences.description: Operators can define areas to avoid during the flight (I guess in case an alternative is sent)

max_speed_pref.description: Maximum speed desired by the operator. In the UC3 planner applies to all the flight and will try to fly at that speed where possible.
